column1: I'm looking for a dark roast here
incredibly thick skinned , unroastable, try me!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I just drank two liters of Coke after not touching a drop for two weeks, roast me so hard I'll get PTSD thinking about Coca Cola.
I highly doubt anything substantial could come from the neck-bearded children on this subreddit but sure I’ll go through some more disappointment. Anything original?
please ruin this exchange student's day
5”4 and gay. That’s all that needs to be said.
It's getting colder, I could use the heat.
Fun loving easy going neighborhood pharmacist, always ready to help
